FILTER_BY_JOB All Filter and Sort Job Process Stage Read Status Has Unread Messages Has No Unread Messages Done Filter Sort By Most Recent Activity Shortlisting Date Clear View Process For: %1$s, %2$s
Job Settingsc Shortlist Review Type The shortlist review type is the workflow that you’re following for approving or rejecting new candidate submissions. There are 3 types to choose from: Unanimity, Majority or First Choice Rules. If you want to change your workflow or find out more, please get in touch with your Talent Partner These are the users who receive all new candidate submissions and who are responsible for approving or rejecting them These are the users who can be added to interviews for processes associated with this job Once an interview is completed, these users are responsible for entering whether the candidate is progressing or whether they are rejected. If there are multiple Interview Advancers, only one roleAvailableUser has to make a decision to keep things moving These users are the points of contact for gathering offer information. Users who are not Offer Managers will not see any of the offer details, nor will they be able to see any candidate’s salary on their profile, nor the salary on the job in question Add new users to: New Processes Only Old + New Processes Sorry, you don\'t have user manager permissions so cannot edit user responsibilities. Please get in touch with your colleagues below who do have the correct permissions. They can make the changes for you or can give you the permissions you need: Can\'t find who you\'re looking for? They might for on Hidden yet. <font color="#66CC66">Add them here</font> %1$s in %2$s Removing %1$s from the %2$s Remove from:
Process Setting Changing these settings will only affect this individual process with Andrea. If you want to change the settings for all candidates in process with this job, please change the <font color="#66CC66">Job Settings</font> Got it Remove
